metadata.title: CVE-2024-54677 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption vulnerability in the examples webapplication provided with Apache Tomcat leads to denial of service.This issue affects Apache Tomcat: from 11.0.0-M1 through 11.0.1, from10.1.0-M1 through 10.1.33, from 9.0.0.M1 through 9.9.97.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 11.0.2, 10.1.34 or 9.0.98,which fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: tomcat7 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
